synopsis.text: War rior Deunan Knute and her cyborg ally, Briareos, navigate a post-apocalyptic New York City in search of the fabled utopia, Olympus. Indebted to the local cyborg overlord, Two Horns, they face constant sabotage and manipulation while working for him. Their lives take a turn when they cross paths with Olson and Iris, two individuals from Olympus with valuable knowledge, who are being pursued by ruthless cyborgs. Deunan and Briareos join forces with Olson and Iris to thwart the malevolent cyborg Talos' ambitions of capturing a powerful secret weapon, ultimately safeguarding humanity's last hope.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
